p: Approved by the Danish Patient Safety Authority and the Danish Data Protection Agency, we related medication to outcome in all SARS-CoV-2 PCR positive patients, who, between 1 March and 1 April 2020, had remained admitted with infection to hospital for at least 24â€Šh in two of five Danish regions (2.6 million inhabitants). We looked at a composite outcome of ICU-admission or death and determined the relative risk of RASi in logistic regression models estimating odds ratios of ICU-admission adjusted for time to event or censoring.
